descriptors.name: ot-ncp-ftd
descriptors.label: OpenThread - NCP (FTD)
descriptors.description: This is a simple OpenThread Full Thread Device NCP application. This is equivalent to the ot-ncp-ftd application in the OpenThread GitHub repo.

descriptors.name: ot-ncp-mtd
